title: Eva Longoria Has a 'Desperate Housewives' Reunion, Jumps On Ricardo Antonio Chavira
text: Eva Longoria Has a 'Desperate Housewives' Reunion, Jumps On Ricardo Antonio Chavira Saturday, 3 October 2015 (12 minutes ago) Eva Longoria jumps on her co-star Ricardo Antonio Chavira while filming a funny scene for the upcoming series Hot and Bothered on Thursday (October 1) in Studio City, Calif. The 40-year-old actress and Ricardo, 44, played husband and wife on the long-running series Desperate Housewives and itâ€™s great to see them back together! PHOTOS: Check [...]
